author: Alexander Pacheco
title: Hearty Chourico Chili
instructions_list: In a large skillet over medium heat saut√© ground beef - salt to taste.
Set slow cooker to high and add tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, and kidney beans.
Add onion, pepper, chourico, and spices to skillet over medium heat for 6 -8 minutes.
Once ground beef is fully cooked, transfer the entire mix from skillet to slow cooker.
Set slow cooker to medium heat and cook for 1 hour.
Top with sour cream, shredded cheese, etc.
